title: PPPoE Account Activation
requestFailed: Request failed, please check network connection
passwordHintCMCCNormal: Default password is last 6 digits of phone number
passwordHintTelecom: Default password is last 8 digits of phone number
passwordHintUnicom: Default password is last 6 digits of ID card
changePasswordCDU: Go to unified authentication system to change password
changePasswordUnicom: Open China Unicom Online Business Hall APP to change broadband password
changePasswordTelecom: to 10001 (Telecom customer service). Follow the SMS reply to reset your password by entering ID card number and other information.

errorCodes.629: Remote computer forcibly closed connection, please try again later
errorCodes.630: Connection failed, device unavailable, check local network card or line
errorCodes.651: Modem or network device error, check broadband device connection
errorCodes.678: Remote computer not responding, network unreachable or line disconnected
errorCodes.691: Incorrect account or password, please verify and retry
errorCodes.692: Hardware failure, check network card or dialing device
errorCodes.718: PPP protocol timeout, possible network congestion or server not responding
errorCodes.734: PPP link control protocol terminated, network error please try again later
errorCodes.815: Server not responding, please contact ISP
